articles.title: SBI raises $1 billion in offshore syndicated loan - The Economic Times
articles.description: The success of this transaction reflects the improvement in the bank's credit and business profile, which is the result of tremendous work put in by SBI as a team over the years,  SBI Chairman Dinesh Khara said exclusively to ET.
